ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: *Speaks with a carefully controlled voice, holding a smoking shotgun in his hand:* I really really really really hate Qwest.... ... Zardus dives out of the way

From: Yanshosh@...

*Speaks with a carefully controlled voice, holding a smoking shotgun in his 
hand:* I really really really really hate Qwest....

::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer/Havoc/Repressor::

Zardus dives out of the way of a couple of shots, a few hitting him in the 
arm. He growls, looking down as Grenade and Kracken fall into a pit.

"Bomb them a bit," he says into his comm-link to Havoc. He watches Havoc 
launch two bombs down at where Kracken and Grenade were, then turns around 
and fires several dozen shots at Jetstorm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Multiple shots hit Reptilica in the back, sending him flipping forward and 
flying down at the canopy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike avoids a few shots, spinning around to looks at Sharpedge. He 
aims his two rifles, firing rapidly at the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Climbing up after dropping a couple of bombs at Kracken and Grenade, Havoc is 
hit by a few shots, swearing.

"Not yet," he replies to Demolition, "Let's recharge a bit more, and cause 
more destruction here."

He aims at Blender, firing a few dozen shots from his several machine guns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor avoids a few shots, turning toward the Mafia base. Seeing the 
shields down, he fires two missiles at it, accompanied by alot of rapid-fire 
lasers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kicking charred plates aside, DevilDuer enters Diamond's ship, looking 
around. Seeing a femm slumped over the controll console, he jogs over to her, 
looking at the extent of her damage.
